segments.text: I can’t believe how much is going wrong in this kitchen right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, the boy is about to fall, and the woman is clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like a disaster waiting to happen, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m amazed at how oblivious the woman is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to falling, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on before someone finally steps in.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everyone seems when there’s so much chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments where everything could change in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m surprised no one has slipped on the wet floor yet.
segments.speaker: PAR
